      public void update​(java.lang.String mex, Command command, java.lang.String senderNick)

      Updates the state of a lobby or a view

      Overrides:
      update in class LobbyManager
      Parameters:
      mex - is the message that has been received and needs to be processed

    • addUser

      public boolean addUser​(User user)
      Adds a new user to this lobby after checking if this can be done.
      Increments numOfPlayerConnected and if maxPlayers is reached the lobby is set to FULL
      Parameters:
      user - the user that needs to be added
      Returns:
      true if everything goes right and the user is actually added, false otherwise

    • removeUser

      public void removeUser​(User user)
      Remove an user from this lobby after checking if the user is actually present.
      numOfPlayerConnected gets decremented and if the Lobby was full "isFull" is set to false.
      If the user leaving the lobby is the last one in it, the lobby gets deleted.
      If the user leaving the lobby is its owner, a new owner is selected between the users still in the lobby.
      Parameters:
      user - the user that need to be removed

    • deleteLobby

      private void deleteLobby​(User user)
      Delete this lobby and removes it from the user's list
      Parameters:
      user - user

    • startGame

      private void startGame()
      Creates a new Controller, sets this Lobby to Closed and every player's status to "IN_GAME"
